markdown:
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 387 2.0 **Patron Theme** [Starless Shadow](/Patrons.aspx?ID=17) **Range** 30 feet **Target** 1 creature **Defense** Will **Duration** sustained up to 1 minute --- Your patron blankets the target's eyes in darkness. If you cast this hex on a willing ally (for instance, one with [light blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22)), the ally can choose which result it gets without rolling. **Success** The target is unaffected.
**Failure** The target is shrouded in murky darkness. It treats [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=407) as [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408), and unless it has [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), all creatures are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) to it.
name: Shroud of Night

summary_markdown: Your patron blankets the target's eyes in darkness.
text: Shroud of Night Single Action Source Player Core pg. 387 2.0 Patron Theme Starless Shadow Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Defense Will Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- Your patron blankets the target's eyes in darkness. If you cast this hex on a willing ally (for instance, one with light blindness), the ally can choose which result it gets without rolling. Success The target is unaffected. Failure The target is shrouded in murky darkness. It treats bright light as dim light, and unless it has greater darkvision, all creatures are concealed to it.
